instruction: Rewrite the following list into a narrative paragraph
input: Giants are large and powerful creatures that are intelligent but easily angered. They can be found in forests, mountains and caves. They often build shelters to protect themselves.
output: Giants are incredibly powerful and intelligent creatures, though they can be angered easily. They are usually found in the forests, mountains and caves, with some of them even having taken the initiative to build shelters near their lairs in order to protect themselves.
